message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with scene text recognition, which is a computer vision task, hence it is likely to belong to the cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) category. The paper also proposes a method based on transformer, which is a popular deep learning architecture for natural language processing tasks, hence it is also likely to belong to the cs.CL (Computation and Language) category. The paper also mentions the use of attention mechanism, which is a common technique in deep learning, hence it is likely to belong to the cs.LG (Machine Learning) category. The paper also involves sequence prediction, which is a common task in artificial intelligence, hence it is likely to belong to the cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) category. Finally, the paper deals with text recognition, which is a common task in information retrieval, hence it is likely to belong to the cs.IR (Information Retrieval) category.
